_source.text: According to data from the United States Department of Agriculture , when it comes to affordable food, nobody in the world is better off than American consumers.

text: According to data from the United States **Department** **of** **Agriculture** , when it comes to affordable
food, nobody in the world **is** **better** off than American consumers.

_source.text: 4. Cinnamon : Researchers at the United States Department of Agriculture showed that a quarter to one teaspoon of cinnamon with food helps metabolize sugar up to twenty times better than food not eaten with cinnamon.

text: 4. Cinnamon : Researchers at the United States **Department** **of** **Agriculture** showed that a quarter to
one teaspoon of cinnamon with food helps metabolize sugar up to twenty times **better** **than** food not eaten with cinnamon.

_source.text: Adopting the slogan 'Prevention is better than cure', this Ministry of Health poster attempts to persuade people to adopt a healthier lifestyle.

text: Adopting the slogan 'Prevention **is** **better** **than** cure', this **Ministry** **of** **Health** poster attempts to persuade people to adopt a healthier lifestyle.
